svg.style: font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; background-color: white; text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;

text.tspan: Global freshwater withdrawals for agricultural, industrial and domestic uses by aggregated regional groupings. OECD
members are defined as countries who were members in 2010 and their membership was carried back in time.
BRICS countries are Brazil, Russia, India, China and South Africa. ROW refers to the Rest of the World, excluding
